** Dinobot kept a close optic on Tavatron as she fought somewhat close to 
their commander, growing as his scanners found a rather damaged target: 
Nemesis Enforcer.
But his scanners also indicated that he was far too weak to pose a rather 
proper threat to himself and could easily be taken care of by another. 
Besides, he had now spotted a rather better target.
Dark Wolf!
Dinobot growled and scanned the bot carefully, judging his weight as beast 
he could from his current position, as well as his firepower.
An energy sword, which sent blades of destructive energy.
It was a rather dull weapon but a powerful one none the less.
Targeting with his sight Dinobot aimed towards Dark Wolf's midsection, the 
thickest part of his body and one he was most likely to hit.
The head or an arm would only have a 30 % out of 100% to strike dead on 
target.
With his target locked Dinobot moved quickly towards him, but not in plain 
view until the last moment.
He snarled savagly before firing. But not charges, it was the paralyze beam 
instead. With this bot easily unable to move he could quickly be 
terminated!**
